Specimen Type(s): Colonies grown on solid media of aerobic streptococci
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for MicroScan MICroSTREP plus Panel Erythromycin for antimicrobial susceptibility testing of aerobic streptococci using broth microdilution and instrument-read methods.
Indications for Use Summary: Determines quantitative and/or qualitative susceptibility of aerobic streptococci, including Streptococcus pneumoniae, to Erythromycin using manual or instrument-read methods.
